project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Define the questions and answers in variables
Implement the user interface for the quiz
Write the logic to track the user's score
Display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for the implemented features (questions, score tracking, and display)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
